## Data Exploration and Summarizing 

```{r}
#attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
View(diamonds)
```

```{r}
#explore names(), dim(), summary(), head(), tail(), and skimr::skim()

names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

Create Plots
```{r}
#create a pairs plot 

GGally::ggpairs(penguins)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity, y = price)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
